oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Man holding a banner featuring a cartoon of Mubārak
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Eldiwany, Ahmed
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The banner features a political cartoon of Ḥusnī Mubārak trying to hold on to his seat of power while being pulled off. Photographer's description: Pictures taken during the Egyptian Revolution. Text in image: NOW IS NOW - متمسكون بمصالحكم Translation of Text in image: adhered to your position.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mubārak, Muḥammad Ḥusnī, 1928-
Caricatures and cartoons; Demonstrations; Egypt; Protest movements
Flags; Men; Protest posters
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: University on the Square: Documenting Egypt's 21st Century Revolution
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: University on the Square: Documenting Egypt's 21st Century Revolution Photographs; Rare Books and Special Collections Library; American University in Cairo
